attributes.action: do something to stop banks making charges for current accounts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we pay charges to banks who look after our money? They are already making billions of pounds of profit in interest. Please do something to stop this greed, it is unacceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
